name: Pale Man!
description:
💎💎💎💎💎💎💎💎
Pale Man! - A game about a man who loves to jump, who turned out to be in the world of platforms.
This world turned out to be difficult ... it has a leader and his creator himself, who loves to communicate with his inhabitants. And each newcomer, he arranges a fascinating excursion into this world.

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/ezgif_com-video-to-gif_7.gif[/ img]

You have to be surrounded by thorns, which are very prickly and ready to kill at any convenient time. The game will not let you get bored, because the manager will always communicate with you and joke.
And by the way, he called you a dumpling, nothing personal.
Good luck!

{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/ezgif_com-video-to-gif_8.gif[/ img]

- Fascinating gameplay
- Breaking the fourth wall of the replica
- Do not give bored levels
- Good sound
